text_result.title: MedlinePlus 			Medical Encyclopedia: <span class="mak_1"><span class="mak_1">Miscarriage</span> </span>
text_result.fulltxt:
<ul>
 <li> Medical Encyclopedia Miscarriage A threatened miscarriage or spontaneous abortion occurs in approximately 10 of pregnancies between 7 and 12 weeks of gestation Symptoms include vaginal bleeding abdominal cramps and low back pain Update Date 8 17<strong>  . . .</strong></li>
